item.title: End CA-247 South at CA-62
item.description: End CA-247 south at CA-62. Use CA-62 east for 29 Palms; use CA-62 east for I-10 and Morongo Valley.

item.title: CA-247 South at CA-18
item.description: CA-247 south at CA-18. This is not the true junction with CA-18, which lies a little to the south and east. Use CA-18 west for Victorville; use CA-18 east for Big Bear Lake; use CA-247 south for 29 Palms.

item.title: I-40 West - I-15/CA-58 Access
item.description: Approaching Exit 1 on I-40 west. There is no direct connection from I-40 west to I-15 north. For I-15 North/Las Vegas access, use Exit 1 (Main St.). For I-15 South/To CA-58 West/San Bernardino continue west on I-40.

item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 1 - East Main St.

item.description: I-40 west approaching I-15. Use Exit 1 for I-15 north. Continue west on I-40 for I-15 south.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 133
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 133 - US-95 North/Searchlight/Las Vegas. US-95 north leaves I-40 westbound here and heads north into Nevada. Eastbound, US-95 south joins I-40 through Needles.

item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 133 - US-95 North/Searchlight/Las Vegas.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 141
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 141 - W. Broadway/River Road. This is the eastern end of the Needles business loop.

item.description: I-40 West/US-95 North shields in Needles.

item.description: I-40 west at Exit 142 - J St./Downtown.

item.title: I-40 West - Needles Exits
item.description: Needles Exits on I-40 west. The next two exits are J St. and West Broadway/River Road. Sign in background directs Bullhead City (Arizona) traffic to use the J St. exit.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 143
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 143 - US-95 South/E. Broadway. US-95 north joins I-40 west through Needles. This is the eastern end of the Needles business loop.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 144
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 144 - US-95 South/East Broadway.

item.title: I-40 West - Mojave Desert Services
item.description: Services in the Mojave Desert along I-40 west between here and Newberry Springs. Both Needles and Ludlow have services. Also, distance to the next Rest Areas and their status.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 148
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 148 - To US-95 South/Blythe. The US-95 shield is displayed as text on this sign. This exit serves File Mile Road, and provides a cutoff between I-40 and US-95 south.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching California State Agricultural Inspection Station
item.description: I-40 west approaching the California State Agricultural Inspection Station at Needles. All traffic has to stop for inspection.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 153
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 153 - Park Moabi Road. First California exit on I-40 west.

item.title: I-40 West - Entering Pacific Time
item.description: Entering Pacific Time on I-40 west. Arizona does not observe daylight savings time, so during the summer months Arizona and California are on the same time.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 153
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 153 - Park Moabi Road. This is the first exit on I-40 inside California westbound.

item.title: Welcome To California - I-40 West
item.description: Welcome to California on I-40 west at the Arizona-California state line crossing the Colorado River. San Bernardino County line.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 40 and 41
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 40 - S. Hamner Ave./Milliken Ave. Next exit is Exit 41 - I-15/Barstow/San Diego.
